---
title: "California-Current ECCAL"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"
---

This model is for the coast of California. It was the first Atlantis model [formally reviewed](atlantis-california-current-model-review.qmd).

An example of how this model used is to explore
- [alternative management strategies for the groundfish fisheries](attachments/193889596.pdf) in the region (and [supplementary materials](attachments/193889597.docx) with detail)
- the [depletion of forage fish](attachments/193889598.pdf)
- the [effects of ocean acidification](attachments/193889595.pdf)
